name: tm79
effect: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dark Pulse)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may also
make the target flinch.

The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. It may also
make the target flinch.

The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally
fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power
is increased.
